name: MatchRecord

methods.name: getAdditionalInformation
methods.description: Returns other information about a matched record. For example, a matchGrade represents the quality of the data for the D&B fields in the matched record.

methods.name: getFieldDiffs
methods.description: Returns all matching rule fields and how each field value compares for the duplicate and its matching record.

methods.name: getMatchConfidence
methods.description: Returns the ranking of how similar a matched recordâ€™s data is to the data in your request. Must be equal to or greater than the value of the minMatchConfidence specified in your request. Returns -1 if unused.

methods.name: getRecord
methods.description: Returns the fields and field values for the duplicate.

description: Represents a duplicate record detected by a matching
